channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Chuck Woolery, smooth-talking game show host of ‘Love Connection’ and ‘Scrabble,’ dies at 83
item.description: Chuck Woolery, the affable, smooth-talking game show host of “Wheel of Fortune,” “Love Connection” and “Scrabble” who later became a right-wing podcaster, skewering liberals and accusing the government of lying about COVID-19, has died.

item.title: Record dryness in US Northeast should change water behavior, experts say
item.description: The U.S. Northeast is experiencing an unusually severe and widespread drought during months that are typically the wettest.

item.title: He’ll be the last meatpacker in the Meatpacking District. Here’s how NYC’s gritty ‘hood got chic
item.description: The last meatpackers in New York’s Meatpacking District have agreed to end their leases early and make way for development on their city-owned lot.
